013package org.apache.juneau.rest.rrpc;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016import java.io.*;
017import java.lang.reflect.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
023
024/**
025 * A session for a single HTTP request against an RRPC Java method.
026 *
027 * <ul class='notes'>
028 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe.
029 * </ul>
030 *
031 * <ul class='seealso'>
032 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.RestRpc">REST/RPC</a>
033 * </ul>
034 */
035public class RrpcRestOpSession extends RestOpSession {
036
037   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
038   // Static
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040
041   /**
042    * Static creator.
043    *
044    * @param ctx The context of the RRPC Java Method.
045    * @param session The REST session creating this session.
046    * @return A new builder.
047    */
048   public static Builder create(RrpcRestOpContext ctx, RestSession session) {
049      return new Builder(ctx, session);
050
051   }
052
053   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054   // Builder
055   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056
057   /**
058    * Builder class.
059    */
060   public static class Builder extends RestOpSession.Builder {
061
062      RrpcRestOpContext ctx;
063
064      /**
065       * Constructor.
066       *
067       * @param ctx The context object of the RRPC Java method.
068       * @param session The REST session.
069       */
070      public Builder(RrpcRestOpContext ctx, RestSession session) {
071         super(ctx, session);
072         this.ctx = ctx;
073      }
074
075      @Override
076      public RrpcRestOpSession build() {
077         return new RrpcRestOpSession(this);
078      }
079
080   }
081
082   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
083   // Instance
084   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
085
086   private final RrpcRestOpContext ctx;
087
088   /**
089    * Constructor.
090    *
091    * @param builder The builder for this object.
092    */
093   protected RrpcRestOpSession(Builder builder) {
094      super(builder);
095      ctx = builder.ctx;
096   }
097
098   @Override
099   public void run() throws Throwable {
100
101      super.run();
102
103      RestRequest req = getRequest();
104      RestResponse res = getResponse();
105      RestSession session = getRestSession();
106
107      final Object o = res.hasContent() ? res.getContent(Object.class) : null;
108
109      if ("GET".equals(session.getMethod())) {
110         res.setContent(ctx.getMeta().getMethodsByPath().keySet());
111         return;
112
113      } else if ("POST".equals(session.getMethod())) {
114         String pip = session.getUrlPath().getPath();
115         if (pip.indexOf('/') != -1)
116            pip = pip.substring(pip.lastIndexOf('/')+1);
117         pip = urlDecode(pip);
118         RrpcInterfaceMethodMeta rmm = ctx.getMeta().getMethodMetaByPath(pip);
119         if (rmm != null) {
120            Method m = rmm.getJavaMethod();
121            try {
122               // Parse the args and invoke the method.
123               Parser p = req.getContent().getParserMatch().get().getParser();
124               Object[] args = null;
125               if (m.getGenericParameterTypes().length == 0)
126                  args = new Object[0];
127               else {
128                  try (Closeable in = p.isReaderParser() ? req.getReader() : req.getInputStream()) {
129                     args = p.parseArgs(in, m.getGenericParameterTypes());
130                  }
131               }
132               res.setContent(m.invoke(o, args));
133               return;
134            } catch (BasicHttpException e) {
135               throw e;
136            } catch (Exception e) {
137               throw new InternalServerError(e);
138            }
139         }
140      }
141      throw new NotFound();
142   }
143}
